ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like you might benefit from Velious armor.  At 51, I think Thurgadin is more likely than Skyshrine.  I haven t started the armor parts (just getting
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like you might benefit from Velious armor. At 51, I think Thurgadin
is more likely than Skyshrine. I haven't started the armor parts (just
getting gems, atm), but I believe the Thurg armor quest pieces drop in Kael
arena, and Skyshrine pieces in Halls of Testing.

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 12, 2002 3:52 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear


Ugh, I just saw one in the bazaar 17500pp.. way out of my liege..
Well I bought a black enameled BP. Which I am trying to sell now for 800PP
(bought it cheap)
Must admit that i also bought an harmonic dagger :P Couldent help my self.

Thanks for the suggestion Minkin, Anyone else have suggestions for upgrades?
Im looking for stuff in the 1kpp to 2kpp range. Thats what I can afford..
Btw any one got suggestions to where I could go at 51 for some nice exp?
Is Velktors still good? or are there better places on luclin?

Musiker

>
>
> ditch the lambent bp and go buy a phase spider carapace,
> they're going for
> dirt cheap these days in bazaar and they've got respectable
> stats. I was
> using one till i got my vindi bp
>
> Minkin
> A Ro

>
>
> Hi all,
> I am returning to Norrath after a looong break.
> I just bought Luclin and is in desperate need of equipment
> upgrades. I plan
> to try and dump some of my junk at the bazaar, but need some
> advice on what
> to buy and what to pay :)
>
> My standard gear is as follows:
> - Singing steel boots
> - Singing steel Gauntlets
> - Sleeves of the Ancient
> - Lambent BreastPlate
> - Lambent Greaves
> - 2x Opaline Earrings
> - 2x Velium fire wedding rings
> - Guardian helmet
> - Spider fur coat
> - Troll Hide belt
> - Orc Fang necklace
> Weapons:
> - Journey mans walking stick
> - Icepaw war claw
> - Sarnak Skull splitter
> - Smoldering brand
>
> I have a bunch of junk to sell apart from the above mentioned
> thigns and
> around 1700pp in cash.. I think I maybe can raise 3000pp if
> Im lucky :/
> Any suggestions for what to upgrade and what to pay for the
> upgrades will be
> greatly appriciated..
>
> Regards
> Musiker, Minstrel of 51 songs
>
